articles.author: Bill Pritchard
articles.title: Edge Has An Offer For A WWE Contract Extension Waiting, He’s Unsure Of His Future - Wrestlezone
articles.description: Edge has taken to social media to comment on the reports about his future after it was reported that WWE turned down his request to re-sign.
articles.content:
Edge says he needs to figure out his next step.
